title: Plotting external data
text: Three regions, three p-values: Pass data ggplot() map fill variable: Brain plot three regions coloured p-value. Regions data appear NA (grey default). Regions data don’t match atlas silently dropped, watch spelling.

title: Plotting external data
text: data grouping variable, facet_wrap() facet_grid() work ’d expect. geom_brain() detects faceting variables replicates full atlas panel: Brain plots faceted age group custom colour gradient. need call group_by() first – geom handles atlas replication automatically. title: Reading FreeSurfer stats files
text: recon-finishes, subject stats/ folder parcellation data. read_freesurfer_stats() reads one file time: hemisphere encoded filename (lh. rh.). match atlas, prepend label column:
code: subjects_dir <- Sys.getenv("SUBJECTS_DIR") stats_file <- file.path(subjects_dir, "bert/stats/lh.aparc.stats")  data <- read_freesurfer_stats(stats_file) data ggplot(data |> mutate(label = paste0("lh_", label))) +   geom_brain(atlas = dk(), mapping = aes(fill = ThickAvg))

title: Reading FreeSurfer stats files
text: read_atlas_files() reads matching stats files subjects directory. Pass regular expression select right files: trailing $ matters – ensures get aparc.stats aparc.a2009s.stats. function adds hemisphere prefixes automatically, data ready plotting: show metrics , pivot facet:
code: dat <- read_atlas_files(subjects_dir, "aparc.stats$") dat ggplot(dat) +   geom_brain(atlas = dk(), mapping = aes(fill = ThickStd)) library(tidyr)  dat |>   pivot_longer(-c(subject, label), names_to = "stat", values_to = "val") |>   ggplot() +   geom_brain(atlas = dk(), mapping = aes(fill = val)) +   facet_wrap(~stat)

title: Reading FreeSurfer stats files
text: FreeSurfer’s aparcstats2table asegstats2table commands create summary tables across subjects. Read read_freesurfer_table(): output three columns: subject, label, value.
code: table_path <- "path/to/aparc.volume.table"  read_freesurfer_table(table_path)

title: Reading FreeSurfer stats files
text: Stats tables append measure name label (e.g. lh_bankssts_volume). measure argument strips suffix renames value column:
code: dat <- read_freesurfer_table(table_path, measure = "volume") dat

title: Reading FreeSurfer stats files
text: FreeSurfer tables include summary measures (total volume, ICV) don’t correspond atlas regions. Filter plotting: grepl("lh|rh", label) pattern keeps hemisphere-specific rows.
code: ggplot(dat |> filter(grepl("lh|rh", label))) +   geom_brain(atlas = dk(), mapping = aes(fill = volume))
